name: Home Alone (itch) (FasePlay)
description:
When peacefully watching a video, you suddenly realize, that you are not alone.

Created for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2

Play in Fullscreen.

If you are stuck
  • If you can't find the key, look in the comments to see its placement.
  • If you can't open a door in a long corridor, try aiming at its right top corner, until you see text.
